00034 void RPoint3od::read(RDK2::Serialization::Reader*r) 
00035     throw (RDK2::Serialization::ReadingException) 
00036 {
00037     r->startReading(getClassName());
00038         x = r->read_f64();
00039         y = r->read_f64();
00040         z = r->read_f64();
00041         theta = r->read_f64();
00042         phi = r->read_f64();
00043         gamma = r->read_f64();
00044     r->doneReading();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void RPoint3od::write(RDK2::Serialization::Writer*w) const 
00048     throw (RDK2::Serialization::WritingException) 
00049 {
00050     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00051         w->write_f64(x,"x");
00052         w->write_f64(y,"y");
00053         w->write_f64(z,"z");
00054         w->write_f64(theta,"theta");
